fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 1536: Marshal and at least one Army Protective will always spawn.
- No factional chat
- No factional kill
- If the Marshal dies, the Army has three days to win. After that, if the Army would win, the game is declared a draw instead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who would not follow martial law.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Eliminate all who would not follow martial law.
